current.merchandise_html:
Best Price Guarantee: Panacche Estimate does not take into account current offers and discounts from the retailers.
We will try to beat their current deal and offer you the best price.
Shipping Fee: We will try to work with the retailers to get the shipping fee waived, however this is subject to the individual vendor shipping policy.

Here is what will happen next.

  1. Click on 'Add to Cart' and follow the steps for the items you'd like to purchase.
  2. Panacche deal hunters will start hunting for the best discount by leveraging our vendor partnerships.
  3. We will send an updated invoice for your review and approval to proceed with the purchase.
  4. Once the invoice is processed, we will send you a confirmation along with shipping and delivery information.
current.checkout_body_font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'

settings.title:
Designing Dreams One
Room at a Time
Option A – Shop A Room
settings.text:
Step 1. A dream design comes with a dream designer. You shop the look. And watch the designer brings it to life.

Step 2. Pick a design that echoes your tastes.

Step 3. We build you a room board. From fabrics to paint, moods to hues, we give it all.

settings.title: Option B – Custom Comfort
settings.text:
Step 1. You bring us a vision.

Step 2. We match you with the perfect designer.

Step 3. Together, you test and tinker, break and build, and breathe life into your vision.

Our designs are modern-chic, temptingly vintage, and alluringly warm.

- We do what others do. And do it better.

- No Vendor tie-ups

- No mark-ups on furniture bought through us.

- We offer trade discounts.
settings.title: Why We Stand Out?

settings.budget_note: **Includes total retail value of merchandise/accessories. It  does not reflect any local trades experts, you may  need to hire for the execution of the design

*All design sales are non-refundable.

settings.title: WHY WE STAND OUT

Our designs are modern-chic, temptingly vintage, and alluringly warm.
- No Vendor tie-ups
- No mark-ups on furniture bought through us.

- Quick, easy and hassle-free approach to getting a designer look.

settings.section_title: Sign up for newsletter and save 25% off your next purchase

settings.text:
1. Is there a cost for Interior designers to join Panacche?

Panacche is FREE for interior designers to create an account and sell designs as part of our initial launch offering.

2. Is there a cap on how many designs, a designer can upload?

There is no cap on the number of designs currently, however this can change in the future with the increasing designer traffic.

3. Do designs have to go through an approval process?

Yes, all designs whether newly created or an update have to go through an approval process first before publishing to the sales flow.

4. What are the design criteria?

All the designs have to photo-realistic and in 4k, 3d rendering. Each room design should contain pictures from all the angles of a room. A moodboard should also be provided.

5. What furniture, decor items can be used for generating designs?

All the furniture, decor used in the design should be from the vendor who we have partnered with. The furniture, decor should be real-shoppable items.

6. Is there a minimum number of designs required to join Panacche?

Yes at a minimum, we need at least 10 designs submitted to join Panacche. You can choose to submit more. More designs submission will result into more sales and in turn will result into more commission.

7. What are the customer deliverables once designs sell that the designer is responsible for?

Here are the deliverables that the designer is responsible for when their design sells.

a. Design Implementation Guide: This outlines on how to execute the design for the customers to achieve the look. b. Shopping List c. Interact with the customer on Panacche platform to answer their questions or make up to 3 changes to the design purchased. d. Create Floor plan for the customer space. e. 3D Rendering of the customer's space with the purchased and updated design. f. Paint palette
